article_title: 10 Common Medical Tests That May Do More Harm Than Good

article_metadata.description: Do you really need that drug, test, or exam? Probably not, experts say, based on new results from a national campaign to cut the number of unnecessary tests and treatments.
article_metadata.author: Melanie Haiken
